name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James E. HARMON, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James E. HARMON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John R. Walker, Dist. Atty., John F. Nelson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1152
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James E. HARMON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 18, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Barbara B. Townsend, for appellant.
John R. Walker, Dist. Atty., John F. Nelson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
